net.chrissearle.flickrvote.service
Interface PhotographyService

public interface PhotographyService

Interface PhotographyService provides photography/image business logic

Author:
chris

retrieveAndStorePhotographer

PhotographerItem retrieveAndStorePhotographer(String id)
Method retrieveAndStorePhotographer causes flickr to grab a photographer and will save/update the local db.

Parameters:
id - - flickr ID
Returns:
the photographer retrieved. Null if none found.

checkLoginAndStore

PhotographerItem checkLoginAndStore(String frob)
Method checkLoginAndStore causes flickr to check that a given login has succeeded. The photographer will be stored/updated.

Parameters:
frob - - the frob string from flickr.
Returns:
the photographer

retrieveAndStoreImage

ImageItem retrieveAndStoreImage(String id,
                                String tag)
Method retrieveAndStoreImage causes a flickr retrieval of the image (and photographer). Saves/updates to the local db.

Parameters:
id - flickr ID of image
tag - challenge tag
Returns:
ImageItem - null if no image found

retrieveAndStoreImageForPhotographer

                                               String tag,
                                               String photographerId)
Method retrieveAndStoreImageForPhotographer causes a flickr retrieval of the image (and photographer). Saves/updates to the local db.

Parameters:
id - flickr ID of image
tag - challenge tag
photographerId - flickr ID of photographer
Returns:
ImageItem - null if no image found
